short_summary: Automatic microbiological media preparator for the Public Health Agency of Canada.
description: Supply and installation of one (1) Automatic microbiological media preparator designed for the Public Health Agency of Canada located in Winnipeg, Manitoba, with a requirement for delivery by September 30, 2022.
duration_in_months: All bids submitted after 16:00 MDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

full_summary:
### Solicitation Notice
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
发布时间: *August 16, 2022*
截止时间: *September 20, 2022 at 14:00:00 (MDT)*
#### Amendements (MODIFICATION)
Amendment 3 / Règles 3
#### Titre de proces (TITLE/TITLE)
6D063-215611 - Media Preparator / 6D063-215611 - Préparateur de milieux de culture
####  Procuration Référence (PROCURMENT REFERENCE) 
WS3545107316-Doc3599738638 
####而プロセス (PROCUSSION THE NUMBER) 
WS3545107316 
#### UN CODE (TYPE DE PROCESS")/ (UN CODE TYPE)
C-41100000 / Équipements scientifiques et de laboratoire ou 
UN-Scientific and laboratory equipment / 
####DESCRIPTION
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) located in Winnipeg, Manitoba is seeking bids for the supply and installation of an Automatic microbiological media preparator (MFP-100) and provide three years of contractual service.
####THE DISPOSITION DIRECTIRE (TRADE AGREEMENT)
The contract is exclusively subject to the provisions of the: 
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Reciprocal trade agreements between Canada and the U.S.
